main event: On May 22, 1962, a witness observed a circular light in the sky for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound and showed no apparent movement during the observation., The light appeared to be illuminated without any observable source of light., The object was described as remaining in one position and only fell behind trees at the end of the sighting., At a separate event on May 3, 1962, another glowing object was reported traveling rapidly at an estimated speed of 1500 mph., The observer described it as circular or discoid, the size of an automobile, and left no trail.
witness description: a 15-year-old male interested in space and astronomy
